title: 247: CHATTY BROS: Chatting Last Episode + Love Languages + Blue Balls + More! (Getting To Know The Bros - Part 2)
itunes:title: 247: CHATTY BROS: Chatting Last Episode + Love Languages + Blue Balls + More! (Getting To Know The Bros - Part 2)
description:
It’s Friday which means - Bro Time! Evan and Grayston discuss last week’s episode feedback and then dive into more question the #broadsquad has about them! They chat relationship with Bekah and Jess post podcast, role-play, love languages, open relationships, Bekah and Gray getting married, their children’s skills, and more! 

*Broads, let The Bros know what you want to hear about from them! Relationship advice? Would you rather’s? Recapping a different show? - Email us at askthebroads@gmail.com

FOLLOW THE CHATTY BROS HERE: Evan: https://www.instagram.com/trippersounds/

Grayston: https://www.instagram.com/pipyopi/

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:***RELIEFBAND: Go to RELIEFBAND.COM and use promo code CHATTY you’ll receive 20% off plus free shipping! ***DIPSEA: Dipsea is offering an extended 30 day free trial when you go to DIPSEASTORIES.COM/CHATTY***IMPERFECT FOOD: Get 20% off PLUS free shipping on your first order when you go to IMPERFECTFOODS.COM and use promo code CHATTY***HONEY: Get Honey for FREE at JOINHONEY.COM/CHATTY

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
